about: I am an aspiring Full-stack developer, fueled by enthusiasm and a deep interest in Game design. My goal is to carve a career path closely aligned with the ever-evolving landscape of technology. I firmly believe that the future of the tech industry holds a bright and promising journey, and I am dedicated to channeling my skills and passion towards achieving my life's goals. Excited about the opportunities and challenges ahead, I am committed to continuous learning, innovation, and contributing to the vibrant and transformative world of technology.

education.description: I matriculated with a Bachelors pass through hard work and dedication while remote Learning.    üòÅüëç
I recently joined lifeChoices and I am currently participating in their course.

testimonials.name: Muttaqeen
testimonials.quotes: I highly recommend Al-Mu'akhir as an aspiring web developer. Their motivation, keen learning spirit, and strong potential make them a standout candidate. He is sure to excel in the field.

testimonials.name: Joel
testimonials.quotes: Al-Muakhir is a creative, observer, and well-behaved individual who always prioritizes his work. He excels in collaborating with others and has gained proficiency in HTML5, CSS, and Bootstrap. Including Git and GitHub.He has the ability to learn and apply new information rapidly in projects

testimonials.name: Jay-donn
testimonials.quotes: Almuakhir is an absolute powerhouse at work. His energy, enthusiasm, and unwavering dedication are truly impressive. He consistently deliver top-notch results and their positivity is contagious. Working with Almuakhir is a pleasure, and his active, hardworking approach is a valuable asset to our cohort 13 team.

testimonials.name: Zubair
testimonials.quotes: I highly recommend Al-Muakhir Jones as a software developer. Their technical expertise, commitment to quality, and strong communication skills make them an asset to any team. I look forward to the opportunity to work with him again in the future. It's always a blast with him.

testimonials.name: Aakeefah
testimonials.quotes: Al-Muakhir is a true asset to any team. His passion for his work and the ability to deliver exceptional results make them an invaluable partner in any software development endeavor. I highly recommend him for any project.

testimonials.name: Matthew
testimonials.quotes: Almuakhir is one of the most hard working and always easy going person that i have had the privilege of meeting as well as working with. His one of the most hard working people that i've ever had. His passion and desire to always strive for more is so envious and inspirational. The chilled, laid-back person that he is, is one of a kind and i am honored to have him as a colleague but more of as a close friend.
